title: Hope
description: This is the second book in the Danger and Attraction Series.My existence centers only around her... PAIGE Weaker, wearier, and worried.I feel myself surrendering to the pain. I know I need to be strong, bold, and courageous to face the villain who ruined my life. It’s time Caleb’s father paid for his wrongs, and I’m hellbent on taking him down, no matter what—even if it means losing Caleb in the process. CALEBFreedom and hope are all I ever wanted, but disappointment is always what I get. And now, I want so much more—for her, for her happiness, and for her life. One more time, I’m giving up everything I know and risking hope for her. But is it too little, too late?***Not a standalone. ***Paige and Caleb's story concludes in Danger and Attraction #3Previously Titled, Hope in the THINGS THAT MATTER SERIES now titled, Risking Hope, in the DANGER AND ATTRACTION SERIES!
author: Casey Diam
